images.copyright: Oktoberfest in Munich, Germany, at sunset (© AllesSuper21/iStock/Getty Images)
images.title: Prost! Oktoberfest begins
images.caption: Oktoberfest, Munich, Germany
images.desc: Today, we're raising a stein and saying Prost! Step into Munich, capital of the German state of Bavaria, for a celebration like no other. Oktoberfest, first held here in 1810, is a vibrant blend of Bavarian culture, tradition, and, of course, beer.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
